description:
Clark Kent is back. Just in case you don't know who he is, he's a 21 year old STUD that broke into porn through us about a year ago. He doesn't do too many scenes, but we've been able to get a solo out of him every few months.

In this recently filmed scene, Clark Kent enjoys his super hot body in front of a mirror while he kicks back and teases himself while laying on a bed. Clark gets hard and strokes himself to completion, spewing his load onto the mirror.

We love this guy and hope you do too.

Enjoy!
title: Clark Kent
